citations.narrative:
In the third pen of the main barn area, there is a gate that has several horizontal bars separated from the vertical post and
protruding into the pen. These protruding bars could be a potential hazard to the animals and the gate needs to be
maintained in good repair for the animals safety.
Correct by: Jan 14, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.

3.125(a)  Repeat
   
Facilities, general. 
In the third pen of the main barn area, there is a gate that has several horizontal bars separated from the vertical post and 
protruding into the pen. These protruding bars could be a potential hazard to the animals and the gate needs to be 
maintained in good repair for the animals safety.  
Correct by: Jan 14, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
